entries.name: Ecaterina
entries.title: E-commerce Manager
entries.description: Handles inventory, replies to customers (web/WhatsApp/phone), calls, qualifies, sells, tracks parcels, reduces returns and automates social media posts.

entries.name: Aurora
entries.title: Virtual Receptionist
entries.description: Fills the calendar, manages appointments, replies (web/WhatsApp/phone), calls and qualifies, sells packages, reduces no-show rates, personalizes visits, automates social media and manages reviews.

entries.name: Domus
entries.title: AI Real Estate Agent
entries.description: Scans listing portals, captures leads, calls and qualifies instantly, creates videos from listings, answers DMs, schedules viewings, optimizes pricing and manages paperwork.

items: Analyses channel performance (social, web, email, ads) and competitors; surfaces trends and opportunities.

team.closing: Timpia.ro – the first AI employees in Romania, tailored for your company and making work feel effortless

faq.heading: Got questions?
faq.subtitle: Customer support, voice agents, AI systems... it can sound confusing. Here are the answers to the most common questions.

items.question: What can an AI employee actually do for my business?
items.answer: Think of an AI employee like a human teammate, but ten times faster. We build assistants tailored to your workflows so they can handle exactly what you need—nothing is off the table.

items.question: How much does an AI employee cost?
items.answer: A fraction of a human salary. We create packages based on task complexity and most customers recover their investment quickly through time savings and higher efficiency.

items.question: How does the AI plug into my existing workflows?
items.answer: We handle the entire integration. Our team builds the automation layer and connects it to your current stack (CRM, email, etc.). You don’t need to worry about the tech overhead.

items.question: How will the AI employee learn about my company?
items.answer: We train it on your documentation, website and the materials you provide. From there it keeps learning from every interaction, becoming smarter and more precise over time.

items.question: Is AI automation right for the size of my business?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our solutions are scalable whether you’re a fast-moving startup or a large organisation with complex operations. Automation delivers impact regardless of team size.
